name: Sandshrew

attacks.name: Sand-attack
attacks.text: If the Defending Pok√©mon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

flavorText: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for food.

strengths: Sand-attack provides 50% chance to completely negate opponent's attacks
Lightning resistance gives it strong matchups against Electric Pokemon
Low energy cost of 1 Fighting Energy for activation
Evolves into Sandslash which has high HP and strong attacks
Low retreat cost of 1 provides flexibility
weaknesses: Low 10 damage output makes it slow to knock out opponents
Grass weakness is significant with popular Grass Pokemon in format
Sand-attack's disruption is unreliable due to coin flip mechanic
40 HP is relatively low for defensive strategies
synergies: Pair with Defender to further reduce incoming damage when Sand-attack fails
PlusPower can boost the modest 10 damage to more threatening levels
Use in combination with other disruption like Sleep or Paralysis
Works well as a stall tactic while building up benched Pokemon
counters: Bulbasaur - Grass weakness and Leech Seed create major problems
Bellsprout - Type disadvantage makes this very difficult
